title: makkaLE makkaLAl
sahitya:
makkaLE makkaLAl makkaLai ANDiDum marmattaikkaNDavanE Abraham lincan


anupallavi

  takkamE tAviyAna mikka eLiyavanE jta nira samaya bhEdamillAdavanE


caraNam    veLLai karuppenra saLLai ini uNDO veTraDimai uNDO shuTTuDal mAyinum
uLLattil engumE uyirt-tuDippAgiya vaLLalE vAzhga nin manamengum shUzhgavE
